scripts.cy:spec1: npx cypress run --config-file cypress.config.js --spec cypress/e2e/test/* --record --key cace34b3-ddcb-4ed7-a5c0-55741ab4c05d
scripts.cy:spec2: npx cypress run --config-file cypress-login.config.js --spec cypress/e2e/login/* --record --key cace34b3-ddcb-4ed7-a5c0-55741ab4c05d
scripts.cy:nokey:parallel: npm run cy:spec1:nokey -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:spec2:nokey -- --browser electron
scripts.cy:parallel: npm run cy:spec1 -- --browser chrome --group chrome --ci-build-id 16 --parallel & npm run cy:spec2 -- --browser electron --group electron --ci-build-id 16 --parallel
